data.description:
**Update**
# Monkeys in Space! 

- Battle Pass Update with space cosmetics
- Wrist rocket thrusters added as a gimmick
- New low gravity moon map with two giant alien worms
- Secret Asteroid in the crash site with rocket surprise  

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75294244_1914198309023680_1954274135449523927_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QF5ON9LNZrwQ7kNvgFf2rzP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDhIPIW9oo--SLU5GcaXK19HPvAuumOEHS3VA2hLnfoHA&oe=66584B56)

=========================
![{"height":720,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75339310_444997764669963_3806309493143874318_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wdm1Iku5lIMQ7kNvgGUxhaA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCSS2LciZ6kPipHfAET951lPMK40QYB9nwnAQaRkmZUiw&oe=66584309)
**About**
# Live in the heart of the Bermuda Triangle with all your Monkey friends! Swing on vines, throw doo at your enemies, and climb everything! 

- Huge Maps: Explore the Bermuda Jungle, Floating Forests, Ancient Ruins, Lava Chasm, and more

- Unique Gamemodes: Be the first to collect 10 bananas or work together to fend off hordes of crocs -- new modes are coming all the time

- Monkey Apparel: Customize your body color, equip face & head cosmetics, and stylize your doo

- Ruby Mines: Explore a seemingly endless set of tunnels filled with lore, new NPC's, and our Battle Pass! Unlock exclusive rewards like Cosmetics, Doos, Boosters, and more with free and paid rewards! 

Themed Cosmetics & Hands-on Fun: Get your hands on... well, new Hand cosmetics! Plus, a bunch of wacky, interactive items like things you can eat, press, and shake to your heart's content.

Hidden Treasures: Dive into a revamped store experience and hunt for secrets - like a mysterious portal leading to a hidden market. Plus, uncover new secrets via the plane!

changelog.change_log: All ruby mine items should appear now!
All ruby mine items should appear now!
The ruby mine is now open. The first battlepass and more to explore!
Cosmetic fixes, floating doo doo fixes and new valentine cosmetics until the game launches to meta. Let us know if there are major bugs or problems with your account
Cosmetic fixes, floating doo doo and some small server bug fixes
Bug fixes and paint shop update

Hotfix.
* Fixed paint shop
* Fixed lobby sizes to allow for more than 6 players
* Fixed private matches
* Fixed horde mode bugs
* Fixed missing cosmetic variants
* Fixed some more bugs not known to the public

* New movement mechanic, ground pound with a double jump ability
* Hold poop for a stronger poop projectile.
* New hangout layout that helps players with decisions about playing or shopping.
* Simplified a lot of the game mechanics.

Hotfixes:
* Crash site leaderboard fixes
* Wrist UI leaderboard fixes
* Christmas cosmetic shop fixes
* Logout fixes
HOTFIX: We fixed the login streak crate reward and fixed some small bugs happening with the starter bundle and black market.
